question: Gandhar Kingdom of Later vedic phase was mostly located at which of the following places?
option2: Rawalpindi and Peshawar districts of Pakistan
answer: Rawalpindi and Peshawar districts of Pakistan
explanation: Gandhara was an ancient kingdom of the Peshawar Valley, extending between the Swat valley and Potohar plateau regions of Pakistan as well as the Jalalabad district of northeastern Afghanistan. So option B is the correct answer.
